text: Former president and vice president Barack Obama and Joe Biden went to the Invictus Games in Toronto on Friday, and they got to hang out with Prince Harry while watching wheelchair basketball. They had lots of fans. Thank you @ BarackObama @ JoeBiden and Jill Biden for stopping by wheelchair basketball preliminaries with Prince Harry! # InvictusGamespic. twitter. com / ox58XqF3su â€” Invictus Games 2017 ( @ InvictusToronto ) September 29, 2017 Chris Jackson / Getty Images for the Invictus Games Foundation Chris Jackson / Getty Images for the Invictus Games Foundation And it looks like they had a great time cheering on the athletes too.
